days.title: Day 1 Prayer
days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

St. Adelaide of Burgundy, please pray for us, that we may keep the Faith, especially when we have to endure difficult situations.
Obtain for us the graces to be able to fulfill our duties with generosity, in spite of these difficulties. 
Please save my family from evil, turmoil, and betrayal, by placing our petitions before the Lord, especially for (mention request here…) 
Amen.

Concluding Prayer

Heavenly Father, please fill our hearts with love, peace, and charity for members of my family and extended family.
Expel from our hearts all divisive thoughts, and touch the hearts of our family through the intercession of Saint Adelaide, so that we can be whole, united, and dedicated to You. 
We ask this through our Lord Jesus Christ, Your Son, Who lives and reigns with You and the Holy Spirit, one God, forever and ever. 
Amen.
Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be
St Adelaide, pray for us!
